lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: Micro loaning is a practical, personal way to be the hands and feet of Christ to others. As our world expands, I'm eager to assist those within my broadened sphere of influence.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children how to read, write, speak, and do math. I hope everyone I teach learns how to think about how their life influences others.

lender.name: Genene
lender.loan_because:
I love the idea of helping people in third world countries to improve their quality of life and the lives of their families. If I were in their position, I would hope that someone would help me.
A small amount of money can make such a big difference. You have to ask "Why not"?
lender.occupational_info: I work in the area of environmental protection, community and environmental sustainability.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: it is important to help others less fortunate than myself
lender.occupational_info: I work in a large law firm in an administrative role

lender.name: Blogger-Indonesia
lender.occupational_info: Blogger Indonesia blogs Fatih Syuhud Indonesia top indonesian blogger directory cara membuat blog tutorial blogger tips menulis di media massa cetak online blog fatihsyuhud.com

lender.name: Bensteds
lender.loan_because: this is one trip to mcdonalds for my family and I would rather give it to the poor.
lender.occupational_info: I am in year 2 and St Johns in Maitland. I am 7 years old

lender.name: Peter
lender.occupational_info: I build webpages

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: I see this as my way of helping a large number of people who are trying hard to improve their lives.I intend to continue to recycle the loans to others as they are repaid.
lender.occupational_info: I retired after many years as a Financial Planner, giving financial advice to people who were either retired or planning their retirement & now I spend much of my time with my Grandchildren as well as umpiring cricket.

lender.name: Janeen
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Homemaker.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a specialty bread bakery. I oversee production, manage inventory, and manage other employees.

lender.name: Murray
lender.occupational_info: I provide strategic policy advice for the government on mining and energy issues.

lender.name: Jessie
lender.loan_because: I believe entrepreneurship is empowering. I would like to share Christ's love by assisting entrepreneurs in growing their businesses and providing for their families.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I believe in the concept that helping people help themselves is the very best way to assist anyone who needs a helping hand. This is the right kind of charity!
lender.occupational_info: My business help's other businesses in Australia borrow money for vehicles and equipment.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: I care for People that try to help better there life's, so that they can live a normal life and put food on the Table, that we that are better off, take for granted, good luck with your Enterprise, Kind regards Tony
lender.occupational_info: I make Window Shutters for Security and Weather

lender.name: Mario
lender.loan_because: I want to help, to share what and when I can.
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer / work within an organisation that supports refugees and I spent time writing about...

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I want to help people earn an income. I want to make sure my money is going to someone who's doing something to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info:
I write advertisements for all sorts of businesses.
I also draw and paint images and sell them over the internet to people all over the world (but mainly America!)

lender.name: kim
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with opportunity and want to share that with others.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: In the past I've given donations which have been wasted on letters to me asking for more donations. I heard about micro-loans years ago and am happy I can now really help someone to improve their own lives.
lender.occupational_info: I try to help Deaf and hearing impaired & hearing students get the most they can from their time at school.

lender.name: John
lender.occupational_info: I am a computer programmer. I help run clinical trials that test new cancer drugs.

lender.name: Ike
lender.loan_because: I want to give back because I have recieved so much.
lender.occupational_info: It takes a lot of work to free load. I need to wake people up in the morning, get them organized to walk and feed me, and then of course ensure that they are taking me to the right places with interesting things to do and see.

lender.name: Kerrie
lender.loan_because: I have a lot and I want to help others that don't.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Advising how to export and import goods. Also a freelance translator and interpreter

lender.name: Ariane
lender.loan_because: my son introduced me to this simple way of helping
lender.occupational_info: I write, draw, animate, and film

lender.name: Andy,Simon and Matt
lender.loan_because: It helps people help themselves....

lender.name: Miriam
lender.loan_because: a little from me can mean a BIG difference to others.
lender.occupational_info: I am the overall manager of 5 soft furnishing/window treatment companies. I oversee all aspects of the businesses and liaise with staff to ensure a friendly, efficient working environment

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: I love the idea that my donations are used on a prepetual basis not as a once off hand out

lender.name: Danilchik Family
lender.loan_because:
We travel a lot as a family. Explaining the poverty we see to our daughter has been a challenge. KIVA shows her how to combat this problem and provides a way to participate in the solution.
We used the funds set aside for our 20th wedding anniversary as our KIVA seed money.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: it empowers people to make positive changes in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Community Partners develops cooperative links between individuals, groups and Government that encourages Community participation and maximises Community resources.

lender.name: Riley & Mum
lender.loan_because: We should and we can.
lender.occupational_info: PhD Candidate, Community Advocate, Consultant, Mum

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I'm happy to help out.

lender.name: Jamie Lee
lender.loan_because: I want to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate and lead one time service projects

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: To make humanity blossom in all parts of this small planet, each person must share from their riches.
lender.occupational_info: I teach computer information systems to university students.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: as a teacher of business studies and someone who is interested in social justice I think micro-credit is an excellent way in which to assist people in making their lives more comfortable.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a high school teacher who teaches Business Studies (and a few other subjects such as Commerce, History & Geography).

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I care about people and I can't stand the thought of people going hungry and having no shelter.

lender.name: Faye
lender.loan_because: I am very lucky and live in a fairly lucky country too. I would like to help and make a difference when I can.
lender.occupational_info: I have 3 children, whom I bought up on my own, and 2 grandchildren. I work for a politican part-time, as I get older.

lender.name: Marci
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone has a chance to succeed and live their dreams.

lender.name: Pillay, Pranev
lender.loan_because: I can make a real difference again and again with the same money, and I really love the concept.
lender.occupational_info: work part time in a pizza store

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I intend to be the change that I want to see.
lender.occupational_info: I work in Operational Risk Management in a small bank.

lender.name: Fiona
lender.loan_because: its an effective way to have a positive impact on other people's lives. 'From little things, big things grow'...
lender.occupational_info: I work for the State Government in Emergency Management

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: I am lucky to be financially secure & have travelled extensively & seen how alot struggle. Making even a small difference means alot to me
lender.occupational_info: I work as a cabin manager on an aircraft domestically throughout Australia

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I like to see the money in the hands of the needy and not the administrators.
lender.occupational_info: Retired now but was in the electrical industry for many years

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: lending through Kiva builds skills, self-sufficiency and self-esteem in the communities it reaches. That's so much more valuable than a simple donation.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: I feel an obligation to help those less fortunate than myself. It is only luck that I have been born here in "the Lucky Country" Australia.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I just want to see people have an opportunity to participate in their society
lender.occupational_info: I manage all the things in our business like money, cars, buildings, admin, employees.

lender.name: Gwakisa
lender.loan_because: I wanna Start a Company For African Traditional Dances here in Tianjin City China so that I can provide Employment for Tanzanian HIV/AIDS orphans.I can also Start a Small shop for African Cultural Commodities here in China. I'm already doing this African Traditional Dance but not officially as I don't have an official Company to do this.
lender.occupational_info: Tanzanian MD Student here in China,Artist(drummer,dancer,actor).

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: It makes a difference!
lender.occupational_info: The secret of success is perseverence.

lender.name: Matthew Flinders GSC
lender.loan_because: it is a strategy that will work well and for a long time!

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: We live in the best country, we are blessed with an abundance of good food, good education and wonderful health care. It only right and proper that we should help.
lender.occupational_info: We help people in all sorts of cicumstances.

lender.name: Torin
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: Mihi nomen est Torine et mihi duodevigesimum annos natu est.

lender.name: Alf
lender.loan_because: Having a fortunate life it is only the right thing to help those less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I have moved on from paid work and now more or less help my family by doing the odd jobs while they are at work.

lender.name: Roger, Christina & Brody
lender.loan_because: I want to help disadvantaged people in a constructive way, to allow them to provide for themselves and their families, to gain independence and a happier future
lender.occupational_info: I advise on and sell insurance and financial products

lender.name: belinda
lender.loan_because: I can, and I think it is empowering to see people helping themselves.

lender.name: Jordan & Ian
lender.loan_because: We think this is a better way to help people. We asked people to donate to Kiva on our wedding registry and we've funded 7 loans with the money they gave!
lender.occupational_info: Jordan looks after university students at a residential college in Australia. Ian is a DJ.

lender.name: Kirsty & Tom
lender.loan_because: I want to give back to the countries that I have travelled to.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.occupational_info: I used to help to train teachers for primary abd secondary schools. Now I am a volunteer for the NSW National Trust , which works to save the local environment. I also work for an Australian poetry organization.

lender.name: Sorrel
lender.loan_because: It's just so wonderful to be able to help people and make a difference to their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the Pathology Museum that is part of the Clinical School of Medicine in Hobart

lender.name: Raymond
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to help people to help themselves

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Unfettered capitalism and free markets are our salvation.

lender.loan_because: we live in the lucky country
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist, I paint large oil on canvas paintings

lender.name: Annie

lender.name: Stefan
lender.loan_because: I try to make a positive change in this world
lender.occupational_info: We design digital products inspired by the people who use them.

lender.name: John & Phijitra
lender.loan_because: We have a lot of experience living, volunteering and working in the developing world. Kiva is an excellent way to give the hard-working people of the world a chance to better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: John- I teach sociology and have focused my teaching on the contrasts between the haves and the have-nots in the world. Phijitra- I teach Thai cooking and culture in Florida. I try to increase understanding between cultures.

lender.name: Sandra & Beau
lender.loan_because: Trying to make the world a better place one dollar at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an overseas recruitment specialist company that tries to improve people's quality of life by finding them jobs in Australia.

lender.name: Hoki
lender.loan_because: I never lose sight of my dreams....

lender.name: michelle & brian
lender.occupational_info: Caring for others

lender.loan_because: I want to help people to help themselves.

lender.name: Louise and Tom
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference

lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because: It would be nice to help someone who does not have our advantages.
lender.occupational_info: Retired from Work and now look after the house and Spend some time at Church

lender.name: David

lender.occupational_info: I run an office for an international consulting engineering firm in Dubai, UAE.

lender.name: Adam

lender.occupational_info: I manage a poultry farm, where I grow day old chicks until they're big enough to be taken and sold.

lender.loan_because: We wish to encourage self reliance

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I've met them, and they changed my life...so I'd like to help them in return.

lender.loan_because: everyone needs a break in life and if we can help make this happen in our small way - then that's cool!

lender.loan_because: I want to teach my daughter to give to others from her heart. I am happiest when I give.

lender.loan_because: i want to make a difference to someone who is not as fortunate as me

lender.name: Leanne + Jacob

lender.name: Carmen

lender.occupational_info: I make cardboard boxes.

lender.name: Alaina
lender.occupation: Health care marketing and public relations

lender.name: Emma
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: I received a Kiva gift certificate from my son & his family, which got me started. I find this way to contribute to people all over the world very rewarding. It has become a healthy addiction.

lender.loan_because: its the right thing to do.

lender.name: B'nai Jehudah
lender.loan_because: Because we want to make a difference in the world by practicing Tikkun Olam

lender.name: Gordon
lender.loan_because: I want to make a positive impact on the people of the world in my own small way.
lender.occupational_info: I am working to end world hunger through the use of biochar in soil.

lender.name: AJ
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach adult basic education at an adult male correctional facility.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: We can change the world, one life at a time.

lender.name: Philipp
lender.loan_because: Im fascinated by the concept of micro-credits, the possibility to help someone to set up his own business and improve his life.
lender.occupational_info: I assist the managing director of a large German mobile phone company in his daily work. I prepare presentations, manage the weekly meeting of the board members and support him in special tasks.

lender.name: Mrs Tooke
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Clark
lender.loan_because: I believe in free market solutions I am an entrepreneur through and through and I believe that if we don't encourage individualism and an entrepreneurial global society that allows those in other parts of the world to profit through economic means then we pave the way for unethical people to enrich themselves through political means and the use of force. I loan for a better, more peaceful world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a real estate broker/investor in the city of Indianapolis, Indiana. I am also currently pursuing a Phd in Political Science and a Master's Degree in English Literature. I have owned some form of my own business since I was eighteen and I have been self-employed since I was 23. There is nothing that makes me happier than to help someone purchase a home of their very own.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: I believe by working together we can overcome the poverty and problems in the world. I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Defense

lender.name: glyphic
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Making things on the Internet

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I clean and repair musical instruments.

lender.name: Pelle
lender.occupational_info: i am learning people to communicate by new media

lender.name: DrDarryl
lender.loan_because: I enjoy making someone else's vision become reality...
lender.occupational_info:
Im a fellow systems engineer who integrates the technical development effort of multiple engineering disciplines to define, solve, realize and evaluate large scale systems. My skill set includes the application of: mathematics, scientific knowledge, engineering principles and structured engineering processes.
My doctorate in systems engineering was conferred in January 2010.
"I have not yet... ...Learned all that I can learn ...Achieve all that I can achieve ...Become all that I can become ...Love all whom I can love" ~ Jim Ball

lender.name: "JD"
lender.loan_because: Microfinance is a sound capitalist concept. Someday I'd like to profit from it even if it's in a small way. Are you listening Kiva? When do I start to receive interest on my loans?
lender.occupational_info: software engineer.

lender.name: Kang-min
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Wayne and Joyce
lender.loan_because: It is a joy - pure and simple. This is a great - but simple - method to extend goodwill globally. It is said that "Goodwill is love in action" and loaning and re-loaning thru this service is the conduit for us to extend our goodwill around the world.

lender.name: Karin
lender.loan_because: My Mama said, "I hope our kids are very generous, when it comes to worthy causes. All the good you do comes back into your own in some form." Daddy said, "Take care of it if we can help somebody."
lender.occupational_info: I build websites for other businesses and sell flower arranging supplies on the internet.

lender.name: 2 Oregon Gals
lender.loan_because: We loan because we can! Plus, we want to add to others' abundance and help them succeed in their business and their lives.
lender.occupational_info: We run a small writing and editing company

lender.loan_because: I try more time of doing business, but not perfectly doing business, becaus not have capitel. Most needed only 1000 us$ becaus i develop business with in short time & my family will free financial shortness.
lender.occupational_info: i working webdesign work, local & international market, alrady i develop more website. presently i not runing my business.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a business woman.

lender.name: Jo and Adam
lender.loan_because: its empowering to empower someone else and I want to share this feeling with my children.
lender.occupational_info: I am lucky to be a university student in a country where the education of people of any gender and any age is both possible and important.

lender.name: Avi
lender.loan_because: The world can be a better place if we learn how to cooperate and efficiently use our resources. I believe in the human spirit and the ability of individuals to make a difference. lender.name: Alice
lender.loan_because: I want women to be more independent & able to help their family & community.
lender.occupational_info: Volunteer with non-profit group that plants trees to improve the environment & to beautify my city

lender.name: Kimberly

lender.occupational_info:
My jobs? I'm a library assistant in SAISD. I work at an elementary school full time.
My work at helping people?
I'd describe that as the small beginnings of me helping others, which will hopefully increase as time goes by.

lender.name: Patty
lender.loan_because: I want single mothers in the developing world to be able to support themselves and their children.
lender.occupational_info: I provide medical care for people with infections, like AIDS and TB.

lender.name: Lee
lender.loan_because: Jesus

lender.name: Hilary
lender.loan_because: I believe in paying it forward. These entrepeneurs are making the most of available opportunites.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I am a fortunate person that can afford to. I think my money will be put to great use by those I lend to. I look forward to reading about their success.
lender.occupational_info: Cancer screening

lender.name: Scott & Nubia
lender.loan_because: Nubia and I want to help people to succeed and to lead better lives.

lender.name: Jez
lender.loan_because: I can afford to and I believe it will make a difference. Helping people help themselves has to be the best way - a great gift I can provide.

lender.name: Colin
lender.loan_because: I want to help people make positive changes in their lives.

lender.name: Michela
lender.loan_because: We like to help and are big supporters of local entrepeneurs
lender.occupational_info: Michela's a statistician, but has worked in various fields, from Media to Accounting; Simon is a consultant and loves cars!

lender.name: EdT
lender.loan_because: My family and I have been blessed in so many ways. I'm inspired by the people who are working hard to take care of their families, but just need some temporary help to keep improving their situations. I'm grateful for the opportunity to help.

lender.name: Evan
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do, especially when people are ready to work to improve their financial situation.

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of those who are in need.

lender.name: Phillip
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of getting ordinary working people access to capital for their businesses, capital coming from other ordinary working people. People can change the world, one person at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I assist licensed pharmacists in dispensing prescription medications to patients.

lender.name: Technology Goddess LLC
lender.loan_because: I believe that a woman with an idea and a dream is unstoppable! As a single mother who has struggled in the past , I decided my company will have the power to empower other mothers worldwide. Someone took a chance on me, and helped me start my business both as a mentor and financial Angel, now I intend to pass along the good karma...and I believe in Miracles.
lender.occupational_info: Hi, Erika here. I am the CEO of Technology Goddess LLC, and Social Media Mantra. I have four children, three I am raising myself ages 5, 6 and 8. Technology Goddess creates Social Media Marketing strategy that is SEO optimized, and helps business owners find marketing success in social networks.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: I am a Director of a rural economic development district and a business analyst with the U.S. Small Business Administration Small Business Development Center (SBDC) and I speak to start-up businesses everyday in my local community. Loaning to Kiva makes economic sense and it fulfills my desire to give back to a world community.
lender.occupational_info: I assist many entrepreneurs with business startup information in my local community. Kiva allows me to financially support fellow entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Marie & Karri
lender.loan_because: We've been given opportunities ourselves, and understand that sometimes that's all you need to fly!

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: Because I'm lucky.
lender.occupational_info: Teacher: I try and set an example to kids and hope they pick up on my good points and excuse my bad ones. Photographer: I love taking photos that make people stare.

lender.name: Millie and Petal
lender.loan_because: We can make a difference and we have been lucky.
lender.occupational_info: Mixed bag!

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: I like to help people that are trying to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I own a Computer retail and repair shop.

lender.name: Tammy Jo
lender.loan_because: "From everyone who has been given much, much will be demanded; and from the one who has been entrusted with much, much more will be asked." Luke 12:48

lender.name: Graeme
lender.loan_because: To help the underprivileged
lender.occupational_info: I live on a government pension

lender.name: Elsie and Graeme
lender.loan_because: We have had a privledged life and want to give back to society.
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: If we all do a little to help each other, the world is a better place for us all.

lender.name: Rebecca

lender.name: michele

lender.occupational_info: girls clothing designer

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: you gotta start somewhere
lender.occupational_info: keep it mixed up to keep the path interesting and growing.. Currently a student of life.. interested in fiber optics, botany, psychology, anatomy, linguistics, international relations and whatever it takes.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a much better idea than simply buying food. It empowers people to sustain themselves and through sustaining themselves they help to sustain their communities.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: There is no better gift than the gift of giving. I want to give others the opportunities I was given in my life.
lender.occupational_info: My job is for me to inspire people to reach for a higher goal. To be true to and believe in oneself. Do not fear change because God will take care of you.

lender.name: Lynda
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people to help themselves, in improving the quality of their lives. People have assisted me in the past and I want to send this blessing onwards.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with mental illness to manage their mental health better and have more settled lives. I help to teach skills, find jobs and have joy in their life. I work in a mental health community team with an awesome group of people!

lender.name: Beverley
lender.loan_because: I love to see people acheiving their dreams and goals and if I can help even in a small way, its a nice feeling.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: I want to give an opportunity to the needy to improve their life.
lender.occupational_info: I work in Public Hospital in Sydney, Australia

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I want to help others feel good about succeeding

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: To teach my children a loving and compassionate way to live.

lender.name: Naomi
lender.loan_because: the greatest thing you can do for someone else is help them become self-sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I am the Principal of a school for students in Kindergarten through 8th grade.

lender.name: Neil
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a graduate student studying education policy and management at Harvard. Formerly, I taught sixth grade at an east Los Angeles middle school as a Teach For America corps member.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I really enjoy building my own business, and want others to enjoy their own success.
lender.occupational_info: I help people turn their hopes into achievements - both as a pastor, and as a financial planner

lender.name: Lance
lender.loan_because: I want to help others that have the drive to be an entrepreneur and take on the tough challenge of running your own business.
lender.occupational_info: I put large software projects together in the digital video and audio industry/Media entertainment

lender.name: Bettina
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to help themselves.

lender.name: Andy & Stephanie Hood
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed with a good job and opportunities. We want to help others to have those blessings, too.
lender.occupational_info: Andy works for a computer company and Stephanie is a high school math teacher.

lender.name: Chris Gibson
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help people identify the most efficient way to complete a project.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Working towards a PhD in economics.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.occupational_info: I teach adult immigrants to Canada how to speak English so they can find jobs and adjust to living in Canada. I have students from Asia, South America, Africa, and the Middle East.

lender.name: Geoff
lender.loan_because: God would expect no less of us than to help those less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: Change Manager - helping people succussfully transition through personal and corporate change.

lender.name: Rev Michael Kalka
lender.loan_because: I can help people achieve a lasting change in their day to day circumstances.

lender.name: Rachael
lender.loan_because: I cant afford a whole lot in life, but i know i would want others to help me.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I love that the money is going direct to the people who will benefit from it, and it is empowering people to direct their own futures!
lender.occupational_info: I manage the planning discipline in my city for a multi-disciplinary planning and design consultancy. We are very interested in designing cities and buildings that mitigate and adapt to the environmental and community sustainability challenges facing our world. We have offices across Australia and in China and Thailand.

lender.name: Smokey
lender.loan_because: Why not ? You think I just sleep all day ??!

lender.name: darren
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel warm & fuzzy inside

lender.name: Bryan
lender.loan_because: Its an interesting way to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: This is the best way to help individual people.
lender.occupational_info: I help implement systems to make sure meat is safe for people to eat.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I think I can help best this way people who want to grow
lender.occupational_info: looking for oportunities to grow and learn while working for a better future

lender.name: Erin Escobar
lender.loan_because: I am paying it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the legal department in a company.

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: We live a fortunate life, and this is a great opportunity to help people who do not have the resources that are available to us. Microlending is such an easy process to lend money to people who can REALLY benefit, with rewarding results.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital, caring for acutely ill medical and surgical patients. I think I have learnt most about what to value in life from the palliative patients. They really make you realise what is important in life! I have 4 beautiful children aged 16 to 22. Life has been kind to us.

lender.name: Mateusz
lender.loan_because: I'm lazy - it's the easiest way to help somebody!

lender.name: Ali
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I'm grateful that I'm in a position where I can help others.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for the life I lead and I want to give back to those not so fortunate and help them live their dreams
lender.occupational_info: Software implementation manager - working with customers (government departments and large corporate enterprises) to process forms, extract data from the forms and create a data file for the customer - information logistics

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I like to encourage small entrepreneurs expand their business enterprise. Best of Luck.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a small onshore oil and gas exploration company, looking for new deposits in Australia.

lender.name: YUSUKE
lender.loan_because: i want to support people who work hard to carry out their plan.
lender.occupational_info: I have worked since last April.

lender.name: Martina,
lender.loan_because: i like to help people
lender.occupational_info: friendship

lender.occupational_info: A business owner & accountant

lender.name: Emily and Lucy
lender.loan_because: We're two kids being encouraged to learn that the world is a whole lot bigger than where we live.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: I think it offers the best chance for people to build a better future for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I want to help in a small way.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a library

lender.name: Steve & Kerry
lender.loan_because: being self employed, i know how important it is to have capital to commence a business, and the more the better.
lender.occupational_info: i buy and sell live aquarium fish.

lender.name: Belinda & Phil
lender.loan_because: We want to help someone else make a living for themselves and their family.
lender.occupational_info: I try to help businesses keep their workers safe when they're at work.

lender.name: Michael & Judy
lender.loan_because: we are fortunate enough to be able to, and this is a great way to make an impact helping people improve their lives
lender.occupational_info: Health professionals

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I want to see wealth shared more evenly in the world. Those who have great ideas, should not be denied the chance to give it a go due to where they live.
lender.occupational_info: I organise Transport, Warehouses and Supplies for a large company that is involved in Gold Mining.

lender.name: Donovan
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to be able to help people who are struggling to survive. I hope to make a positive change to improve their lives.

lender.name: don
lender.whereabouts: tweed heads sth. New South Wales

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I want to help people and this sounds like a great way to do it.

lender.name: Marianne
lender.loan_because: it is a wonderful idea, and I am in a position to help and it would be wrong not to help those wanting and willing to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an Emergency Department at a Hospital called The Angliss in Ferntree Gully, Australia

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I Can and we all should help in our own way, whether it be small or large.

lender.name: Daniel Debord
lender.loan_because: We believe that everyone should have the opportunity for a better life. The creativity and dedication that GOD has placed in his people around the world is just amazing. It is our privilege to be a part of something this wonderful.

lender.name: Narelle
lender.loan_because: one of the most important books I have ever read - The end of poverty by Jeffrey Sachs- captures the esence and importance of sustained economic growth and the part that we as individuals can play in this. Participating in Kiva allows me to be a global citizen and enables me as an individual to facilitate and participate in some form of global change. At the end of the day, I choose to make a personal commitment to do what I can to promote human well being. It is not a hard decision.
lender.occupational_info: My job is to ensure that children are safe in their families, and that they are protected and cared for, both emotionally and physically. I work with families to help them enhance their parenting skills so that they can provide care for their children and ensure that they have the skills and knowledge to do so.

lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to feed and look after a family on minimal funds; however I still consider myself lucky compared to many others in the world and because of that I would like to share whatever I can with those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a stay at home mum to my 15 month old son and I enjoy spending my spare time reading, writing and budgeting. I hope to one day write a novel and provide my family with the kind of lifestyle I've always dreamed of.

lender.name: Luna
lender.loan_because:
I LOVE this concept! I believe in the connection between all on our planet. By helping even one person, we are lifting the energy for all. I think that empowering someone to build a better life for themselves and their family has an exponential effect... as they become more self sufficient, they are in a position to help those around them. I like the thought that the impact of my initial loan could have a ripple effect.
In addition to being an artist, I am a software developer in the private sector and I have been exploring ways to direct my technical creations toward making a difference. Kiva's concept is incredibly inspiring for me!
lender.occupational_info:
I am a singer/songwriter/photographer/writer/... an eclectic multimedia artist who creates to please, to heal, to entertain... and to inspire. My intention is to spread a positive, empowering message to as many people as I can reach (the world, if my plan goes well... hey, think big, achieve big ;)
My goal: to deliver a message of hope in my art and my creations to inspire and energize all to reach for and achieve their higher destiny.
my blog: www.LunaSees.com

lender.name: Cameron
lender.loan_because: the person benefits directly
lender.occupational_info: security officer in charge of a large communications organisation

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I think this is a wonderful way to make a big difference for a small cost.

lender.name: Raj
lender.loan_because:
..in memory of the fallen , idealistic heroes of the U.S military.
..all said and done, THE liberatingest band of men (...and women) in human history..
All gave some.. some continue to give ALL. .
( This baby boy is waving the flag....at his father's funeral.)

lender.name: Rori
lender.loan_because: I want to do what I can to improve the human condition
lender.occupational_info: I provide coaching and consultation to people who run businesses and are trying to do the right thing for their employees.

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: People look for a hand up, not a hand out. Everyone needs help from time to time - this is just my way of giving back to the universe. As the loans get repaid, the money gets sent back out for others so the cycle of change and growth continues.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I simply want to assist others to come to a place of health and security.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist and I design many different things including jewelry, paintings and also commercial art such as brochures and web pages.

lender.name: Stefanie
lender.loan_because: To share with those less fortunate than myself in an effort to help them become more independent.
lender.occupational_info: I hold a Bachelor degree of Communications with a minor in French. I am starting Nursing School in 6 Weeks and after completion am hoping to be able to work in a place where nurses are needed but hard to come by :-)

lender.name: Kat
lender.loan_because: I want to ease the lives of those less fortunate.

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: If people need help in the world, I'll be there to help them.
lender.occupational_info: I'll be going into middle school in September '08.

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: We are all family in this global village we call Earth ... and together, we can ...change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I have a local, cookie company, in start up, in my life long, home state, Eastern Washington. I will give you an update when we're in production this fall, in Spokane, WA and Pullman, WA

lender.name: steven
lender.loan_because: i care
lender.occupational_info: I am a Rotarian. I work hard, and live the best life that I can - caring for myself and the world and people around me and all over.

lender.loan_because: it feels goods

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others gain their financial independance

lender.name: Otilia
lender.loan_because: I know what a difference a little can make and would like to help.

lender.name: Atlantis Resorts
lender.occupation: Niche Destination - SEM - Search Engine Marketer
lender.loan_because: Through Kiva 100% goes to the recipient. However we prefer to give outright, with the no strings attached save one stipulation; that the recipient, pass on the gift, sometime down the road when he/she/they are in a position to do so.
lender.occupational_info: Mission Statement: To build and grow a niche destination brand online.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: I want to help

lender.name: Barry
lender.loan_because: I enjoy giving a hand to those reaching to overcome obstacles to their advancement
lender.occupational_info: I set up and supervise educational programs for marginalized learners

lender.name: Anastasia
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to increase their quality of life.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I'm paying something forward. God has been good to me, blessed me with miracles and people who have helped me when I needed it. I want to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a home with mentally ill men, helping them gain living skills so hopefully they will be well and be able to live on their own one day.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: It's a small and simple way to directly help someone who is working toward a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I assist with clinical research trials.

lender.name: Surachai
lender.loan_because: Human should have opportunity right.

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: I spent two years in Latinamerica and I love the peolpe there. I have witnessed many women in quite desastrous situations and I am happy about this proactive form of "help"
lender.occupational_info: I do research on the impact difficult life experiences (trauma) have on people`s mental health

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: TLLM
lender.loan_because: We are a charity club who wants to support KIVA. We think that making people smile and proud of themselves makes more happy smiles, so we want the whole world smiling with us! We will work hard to touch the hearts of all sorts of people around the world! We want to loan to change lives!
lender.occupational_info: We are 10-11 year old girls trying to help our world as best as we can! We have gone from normal community girls to saving the world super heros! We want to help!

lender.name: Wing sum
lender.loan_because: It is the best way to lift the poor out of poverty, by empowering them to become entrepeneurs, and road towards financial freedom and wealth.
lender.occupational_info: I design patterns and create artwork for home textiles

lender.name: Charlie
lender.loan_because: People's stories are really interesting and I find it hugely rewarding to help people who want to help themselves.

lender.name: Earl & Lana Rockwall,TX
lender.loan_because: trying to help those in need and support their families

lender.name: Russ
lender.loan_because: I believe in grass-roots small business development.

lender.name: Max
lender.loan_because: our wants vs their needs
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying to become a civil engineer

lender.name: Pierre

lender.occupational_info: I am retired.

lender.name: Kristine Kilburn
lender.loan_because: It makes my heart smile.

lender.name: The Hurley Nelsons
lender.loan_because: We loan because we received the most wonderful gift this year of a Kiva Gift Certificate from our dear, dear friends Michael, Nicole, Lauren, and Sophie. What a wonderful experience learning about all the entrepreneurs we could support with our gift, we finally made a decision to contribute to Edith's farming business, may her loan help her build dreams and comfort many. Giving is the most wonderful gift, the gift to give is truly powerful!

lender.name: Silverboar
lender.loan_because: ...to inspire others to loan. Join me on Team Swiss Kiva http://www.kiva.org/team/swisskiva
lender.occupational_info: I live in Switzerland, but also consider myself a citizen of world, having lived and worked in 11 different countries.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: I believe we have a responsibility to help those in need. We can't help everyone but we can help someone, at home or across the world.
lender.occupational_info: Most of my work is printed on paper; posters, brochures, magazines, advertisements, etc. Some of my work can be seen on a computer screen; websites, graphics on emails.

lender.name: Gustaf
lender.loan_because: My money will make more use helping people build sustainable buiness.
lender.occupational_info: I verify that platforms for GSM, 3G and LTE terminals comply with the 3GPP standard.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: Attempting to give people a chance to improve their lives

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: I can't think of a better way to help those in need than by helping them become self-sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I will be attending UC San Diego this fall and am studying math and economics.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in my new business and want to give back. My passion is to empower women to become self-supporting.
lender.occupational_info: I assist people with develompental disabilities to become as independent as possible.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I want to help others improve their lives. I want to be the hand up.
lender.occupational_info: I inspect manufacturers to make sure their products are clean and safe for the user.

lender.name: karen
lender.loan_because: I was given a loan to start my own hair business and I want other hairstylists to have the same chance!
lender.occupational_info: I am a self employed hairstylist and Artist. I color and cut hair and I am a working painter as well.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I want to assist others to improve their lifestyle for themselves & their families.

lender.name: Barkcloth Hawaii Fabrics
lender.loan_because: It grows good neighbors, good health, goodwill.
lender.occupational_info: Aloha, I am a successful small business owner of an online fabric shop which I began with just a few dollars too. I feel connected to these entrepreneurs. I wish we could trade some of our fabrics as well. Any Kiva lenders purchasing from my site should let me know so I can give you a mahalo discount. Aloha, Nyna

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage those who have not lost the desire to strive, and who still dream in the face of hardship and adversity.

lender.name: Joey
lender.loan_because:
Gandhi said "You must be the change you wish to see in the world"
He was so right!
lender.occupational_info: Student who works part time as a referee.

lender.name: Susana N.
lender.loan_because: I love to help. Many have helped me along my way and the only way to thank them is by passing on the helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I teach languages and foreign cultures to university students of all ages.

lender.name: matt
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel more involved than just donating to some large charity corporation....plus, have you seen the wages the execs earn at some of these charities?? i dont donate to pay their 6 figure salaries!!
lender.occupational_info: my role is to provide information and help hotel guests with whatever they desire; people gotta remember, when u stay in a hotel, make the most of your concierge....we're there to do whatever you need!!

lender.name: Yvonne English
lender.loan_because: I believe that entrepreneurship can solve most of the world's problems. By lending to fellow entrepreneurs in the developing world through Kiva, we are empowering individuals to build their own businesses to provide for their families and to contribute to their local economy.

lender.name: Ernie
lender.loan_because: we are not all lucky enough to be born into a life where we have opportunities. To help in a small way to those who are trying to create theirs is the minimum we can do. Well done to Kiva.

lender.name: Elly
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves a chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I'm retired and like to research family information.

lender.name: Nine50
lender.loan_because: Nine50 imports Silver Jewelry from South America to Australia. Nine50 is committed to helping the people of Peru through various projects including Kiva.

lender.name: Michael & Janet
lender.loan_because: We can!
lender.occupational_info: We are both retired through ill health so no work.

lender.name: Sara - Bee Queen
lender.occupation: Artist, Alternative Builder, Dancer, Bee Keeper,
lender.loan_because: It is important to help others grow, flourish and evolve.
lender.occupational_info: Artist, Dancer, Energy Healer, and Builder of Alternative Structures--- out of mostly reclaimed materials. For transparent body info visit: seventhwave.org

lender.name: sue
lender.loan_because: It is a great idea. I want to help and I like that all of the money goes to the borrower... no admin charges.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Litearcy Coach. I work with teachers to improve outcomes for all students.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: We have so much,and they have so little.

lender.name: sally
lender.loan_because: I really wanted to make a difference and help someone to help themselves and beleive that they can have a better life.

lender.name: terry
lender.loan_because: I like to help people who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: buying and selling

lender.name: rachel
lender.loan_because: i believe everyone has the right to live free of poverty; some of us have the ideas, the knowledge and the desire but unfortunately not the finances to make a better life for themselves and their family
lender.occupational_info: very busy, i have 4 children, aged 18mths, 6yrs, 9yrs and 11yrs. we are always busy doing something with school, homework or sport. i love being at home with my children it is very rewarding

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I love my life and I feel so fortunate and I want to share so others can make a good life for themselves. I picked my first lender because they are weavers and work with fiber.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from teaching at a community college. Now I am a home-crafter working with fiber. I spin and dye yarn that I knit and weave. So far I do this for myself and for gifts. I do have plans to sell some of my products at a local farmer's market hoping to off-set some of the costs related to my craft.

lender.name: Geoff & Jo
lender.loan_because: Dr Seuss once said: Congratulations! Today is your day! Youre off to Great Places! Youre off and away! You have brains in your head, You have feet in your shoes, You can steer yourself any direction you choose. Youre on your own, and you know what you know, And YOU are the [one] wholl decide where to go.
lender.occupational_info: Food research & technology Architecture, design & strategy

lender.name: Val & Dave
lender.loan_because: When I read an article about Kiva in the paper I thought it was such a great idea and wanted to help
lender.occupational_info: Dave owns a small fashion boutique and I work for a building company doing their accounts

lender.name: Patti
lender.loan_because: I have.
lender.occupational_info: I write stories.

lender.name: Jeanette
lender.occupational_info: In Mining

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: The world seems an unfair place: maybe this program might make it a bit less unfair for someone.
lender.occupational_info: Spent most of my working life in education, at primary. secondary and post secondary levels. Now an active retiree with community involvements.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: I like to support people helping themselves, and this is a great way to help people improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the gaming industry, ensuring that the company I work for complies with the government regulations for our industry.

lender.name: agus
lender.loan_because: For support my service in this week. Paymnet the Credit Card. welcome my junior pastor to Batam
lender.occupational_info: I'm a definited pastor in a conggregation Batam. Monthly I rcv $1000,00 for all take home pay. I'd 18 years dedicate my ministry.

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: well, right now I have stopped loaning until Kiva bans cockfighting loans. I am at this time withdrawing my monthly repayments and investing in such as www.energyincommon.org . Most of my MF funds are in Oikocredit, and some through MicroPlace.com . My real interests are not just in supporting individuals, but also their communities and the planet. Investing at energyincommon will allow me to make contributions to better health and air in communities, to the expansion of solar solutions, and to the health of the planet.

lender.name: Josef
lender.loan_because:
I have the financial means to do so with much ease. I remember what It was like for me to stumble around and struggle with money to get started or to just keep it going through lean times.
Being that I run a business myself helping others make alot of money, Kiva.Org suits my personality and my way of doing business perfectly as I can relate to alot of the business owners here.
lender.occupational_info: In simple terms: Help several hundred people make alot of money online by social media websites (mostly) online. I make several thousands per month and I use it to grow myself and my team to even greater financial success.

lender.name: Gail
lender.occupation: I teach managers to be leaders
lender.occupational_info: I help people learn to lead and manage others at work

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: It feels great helping those in need.

lender.name: Yvonne
lender.occupation: farmer and customer service and administration
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to help people directly.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I farm wheat barley and sheep on the Eyre Peninsula in Southern Australia.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: this is just so much the right thing to do. We live in a world of choices and opportunity in Australia that few people really have. So I can go without 10 cups of coffee to help someone do something that makes a huge difference to their life
lender.occupational_info: I am teaching english in china

lender.name: Lord Sundstrom Family
lender.loan_because: We were given a Kiva gift and now believe it is a tremendous way to participate in bettering our global community. Kiva inspires the kinds of connections that create peace.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I saw the value of microloans when I lived in South Africa. They are a powerful force for positive change in people's lives. They are also low risk and unlike many charities, every penny I loan gets directly to the person who needs it.
